org.javasimon.console.text

Class StringifierFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.javasimon.console.text.StringifierFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CsvStringifierFactory, JsonStringifierFactory

    public class StringifierFactory
extends Object
    Base helper class to format values of attributes of simons. This class is in charge of initializing the dictionnary contained in CompositeStringifier. This class can be overridden to export differently JSON, CSV formats
    Author:
    gquintana

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  StringifierFactory.DateStringifier
      Stringifier implementation for Date type.

      Stringifier implementation for Double type representing a duration.
      protected static class  StringifierFactory.LongDateStringifier
      Stringifier implementation for Long type representing a timestamp.
      protected static class  StringifierFactory.LongTimeStringifier
      Stringifier implementation for Long type representing a duration.
      protected static class  StringifierFactory.NumberStringifier<T extends Number>
      Stringifier implementation for Number type.
